prompts: Create a bug-type Pokemon with metallic claws and vibrant red wings.
Imagine a powerful insect Pokemon with a sleek body and sharp features.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a robotic bug, showcasing its agility and strength.
Give me a Pokemon with impressive pincers that can cut through steel effortlessly.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in forests, blending in with nature’s colors.
Generate a Pokemon with a striking red color and a distinctive insectoid shape.
Make a Pokemon that looks intimidating with its fierce eyes and sharp appendages.
